document.full_text: the greek government is on the right path to handle the country's debt crisis and should be supported in its efforts, a top u.s. official said in a german newspaper on tuesday.
document.title: greece on right path to handle debt: u.s. official
lines_and_colors: the greek government is on the right path to handle the country's debt crisis and should be supported in its efforts, a top u.s. official said in a german newspaper on tuesday.
